messages.subject: Steph L from the chat, and a conference postponement
messages.msgSnippet: Steph L.: Shan, can you send me more info about the gathering on the 10th? Steph, if you re on this list, info on the February 10th meetup in Halfmoon, New
messages.messageBody:
Steph L.: Shan, can you send me more info about the gathering on the 10th?

Steph, if you're on this list, info on the February 10th meetup in Halfmoon, New York is here:

I found the question in the chatroom but Shan hadn't seen it and doesn't have contact info.
http://aboutunschooling.blogspot.com/2011/01/im-visiting-northeast-in-february.html

The Uzoma Black Unschoolers Conference scheduled for early March in Atlanta has been postponed without a definite date. Maybe late summer. Maybe a one-day conference. I'm booked most of the summer and might not be in on it anymore (I offered the option, even if I'm available, to lighten the financial and scheduling load, by leaving me out).

This, though, I hope you'll all consider: late July in Albuquerque.
http://sandradodd.com/all

Sandra



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
